description:
Snow is falling out of season. Miroku is abducted by Koyuki, a mysterious woman. Kagome and the others hear from a hunter and his wife about a snow demon. When they go looking for him, they find Sango, who had gotten lost.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Sete anos depois: As neves eternas
The Snow from Seven Years Past
あれから七年目のなごり雪
